entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
